page.title: 14A day in my Life
page.content: Up to a late start at 10.30. Mum was trying an experiment downstairs of scrambled egg done in the microwave. I then went out with my friend to the park, and then to the shops to buy some sweets. I came back much later and had dinner. After Wimbledon we all went out onto Dartmoor. Whilst on the moor we saw a heron fishing in the river. Then we saw a kestral on the rocks. We walked through a bog on the way back and found some cotton grass and some bilberry. Then it was time to go home. At home we all had tea which was lasagne. At 10.00 o'clock I went upstairs to watch television, and went to sleep at 10.30. Jackie Phillips
